Protocols/MiSnapCameraDelegate.html#/c:o.name: -didReceiveSampleBuffer:
Protocols/MiSnapCameraDelegate.html#/c:o.abstract: Delegates receive this message whenever the output captures and outputs a new video frame, decoding or re-encoding it as specified by its videoSettings property. Delegates can use the provided video frame in conjunction with other APIs for further processing. This method is called periodically, so it must be efficient to prevent capture performance problems, including dropped frames.

Protocols/MiSnapCameraDelegate.html#/c:o.name: -didDropSampleBuffer:
Protocols/MiSnapCameraDelegate.html#/c:o.abstract: Delegates receive this message whenever a video frame is dropped. This method is called once for each dropped frame. The CMSampleBuffer object passed to this delegate method will contain metadata about the dropped video frame, such as its duration and presentation time stamp, but will contain no actual video data.

Protocols/MiSnapCameraDelegate.html#/c:o.name: -didFinishConfiguringSession
Protocols/MiSnapCameraDelegate.html#/c:o.abstract: Delegates receive this message after MiSnapCamera is configured and ready to be used

Protocols/MiSnapCameraDelegate.html#/c:o.name: -didDecodeBarcode:
Protocols/MiSnapCameraDelegate.html#/c:o.abstract: Delegates receive this message whenever a PDF417 Data is decoded. This method is called once for each frame where a barcode is decoded. The NSString object passed to this delegate method will contain PDF417 decoded string.

Protocols/MiSnapCameraDelegate.html#/c:o.name: -didFinishRecordingVideo:
Protocols/MiSnapCameraDelegate.html#/c:o.abstract: Delegates receive this message whenever a video is recorded. The NSData object passed to this delegate method contains recorded video.

Protocols/MiSnapCameraDelegate.html.name: MiSnapCameraDelegate
Protocols/MiSnapCameraDelegate.html.abstract: Defines an interface for delegates of MiSnapCamera to receive callbacks

Classes/MiSnapCameraParameters.html#/c:o.name: preset
Classes/MiSnapCameraParameters.html#/c:o.abstract: Sets the preset of the camera session.

Classes/MiSnapCameraParameters.html#/c:o.name: pixelBufferFormat
Classes/MiSnapCameraParameters.html#/c:o.abstract: Sets the pixel buffer format of the camera session

Classes/MiSnapCameraParameters.html#/c:o.name: recordVideo
Classes/MiSnapCameraParameters.html#/c:o.abstract: When set to TRUE a video recording of a session (no sound) is returned. When set to FALSE a session is not recorded

Classes/MiSnapCameraParameters.html#/c:o.name: recordAudio
Classes/MiSnapCameraParameters.html#/c:o.abstract: When set to TRUE and recordVideo set to TRUE a video recording of a session with sound is returned. When set to FALSE audio is not recorded

Classes/MiSnapCameraParameters.html#/c:o.name: videoQuality
Classes/MiSnapCameraParameters.html#/c:o.abstract: Specifies relative quality of a recorded video

Classes/MiSnapCameraParameters.html#/c:o.name: scanBarcode
Classes/MiSnapCameraParameters.html#/c:o.abstract: Indicates whether a camera should be configured to scan barcodes

Classes/MiSnapCameraParameters.html#/c:o.name: supportedBarcodeTypes
Classes/MiSnapCameraParameters.html#/c:o.abstract: An array of MiSnapCameraBarcodeType a camera should scan for

Classes/MiSnapCamera.html#/c:objc(cs)MiS.name: delegate
Classes/MiSnapCamera.html#/c:objc(cs)MiS.abstract: An object conforming to the MiSnapCameraDelegate protocol that will receive callbacks when they’re available

Classes/MiSnapCamera.html#/c:objc(cs)MiS.name: parameters
Classes/MiSnapCamera.html#/c:objc(cs)MiS.abstract: An object that configures camera specific parameters

Classes/MiSnapCamera.html#/c:objc(cs)MiS.name: configured
Classes/MiSnapCamera.html#/c:objc(cs)MiS.abstract: TRUE indicates that camera doesn’t require configuration. FALSE indicates that camera hasn’t been yet configured yet

Classes/MiSnapCamera.html#/c:objc(cs)MiS.name: hasTorch
Classes/MiSnapCamera.html#/c:objc(cs)MiS.abstract: Indicates whether a device has a torch or not

Classes/MiSnapCamera.html#/c:objc(cs)MiS.name: torchOn
Classes/MiSnapCamera.html#/c:objc(cs)MiS.abstract: Iindicates whether the torch is ON or OFF

Classes/MiSnapCamera.html#/c:objc(cs)MiS.name: -updatePreviewLayer:
Classes/MiSnapCamera.html#/c:objc(cs)MiS.abstract: Updates the preview layer with an orientation

Classes/MiSnapCamera.html#/c:objc(cs)MiS.name: -start
Classes/MiSnapCamera.html#/c:objc(cs)MiS.abstract: Start the camera to begin callbacks for the MiSnapCameraDelegate

Classes/MiSnapCamera.html#/c:objc(cs)MiS.name: -stop
Classes/MiSnapCamera.html#/c:objc(cs)MiS.abstract: Stop the camera and callbacks from the MiSnapCameraDelegate.

Classes/MiSnapCamera.html#/c:objc(cs)MiS.name: -discardRecording
Classes/MiSnapCamera.html#/c:objc(cs)MiS.abstract: A convenience method to discards a video recording if it exists on cancel or timeout events

Classes/MiSnapCamera.html#/c:objc(cs)MiS.name: -setImage:frameRate:
Classes/MiSnapCamera.html#/c:objc(cs)MiS.abstract: Sets an image that will be output in didReceiveSampleBuffer: callback with a given frameRate

Classes/MiSnapCamera.html.name: MiSnapCamera
Classes/MiSnapCamera.html.abstract: An interface for a camera that implements an AVCaptureSession.
